definition.name: msysinfo.drv.ms.businessOwner
definition.description: xlfid(NOVLADMSINFO.idmresource.NOVLADMSINFOSystemOwnershipPrompts.gcv.dscr.msysinfo.drv.ms.businessOwner)Specify the business owner of the managed system. Select a user object (not a role, group, or container).

definition.name: msysinfo.drv.ms.applicationOwner
definition.description: xlfid(NOVLADMSINFO.idmresource.NOVLADMSINFOSystemOwnershipPrompts.gcv.dscr.msysinfo.drv.ms.applicationOwner)Specify the application owner of the managed system. Select a user object (not a role, group, or container).
